entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.7°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 5:11 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 5:11 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
